sample: # Example 1: Paired-end data with biological replicates
# Example 2: Technical replicates (same sample sequenced multiple times)
# The pipeline will merge these before downstream analysis
# Example 3: Single-end data (leave fastq_2 column empty)
# - Use absolute paths or relative paths from the launch directory
# - FASTQ files must be gzipped (.fastq.gz or .fq.gz)
# - Sample names will be sanitized (spaces converted to underscores)
